html.value:
Dear {{firstName}} {{lastName}},

Congratulations on your acceptance into the 2021 LEAD Global Summer Learning Institutes! We look forward to welcoming you into the LEADing for Life community. 

Your Payment 1 is still OUTSTANDING for {{programName}} and should be completed as soon as possible. Final Deadline is {{payment1Deadline}}

If you accept your appointment, your First payment of programming fees must be received, along with the Acceptance Form and Parent/Scholar Consent Form. Please make sure your balance is paid in full by the applicable payment deadline to avoid enrollment cancellations.

Applicants will have the option for one payment in full ($4000) or choose two pay option (50 % for First payment and second payment). There will be a processing fee for all online payments.

 

You may contact the LEAD National Office at info@leadprogram.org 

We look forward to providing an enriching experience along with our partner institutions.

 

You still need to complete your payment, please visit your Student Dashboard.

 

 

Sent on behalf of the LEAD Review Team
